page.title: 14GOVERMENT AND RELIGION
page.content: Local members volunteer & are elected to serve on the Parish{Council.}They consider all matters directly affecting Denton & report to South Norfolk District Council who,funded by rates collected from householders, supervise a wider area & provide amenities.Over all is the national Goverment:In the last{election}(1984) although traditionally "Conservative" this area elected an"Alliance" (Social Democratic Party/Liberal)Candidate. An excellent relationship has developed between the United Reform (Congregational)Church & the{Church}of England at Denton St.Marys.Villagers worship at either building & are united to the extent of sharing the profits from the annual summer fete & christmas fayre.The churches are run by Parochial Church Councils.There is a{Sunday School}for the children.
